[冃]
Pictogram ( 象形 ): a hat — original form of 帽 ( OC *muːɡs , “hat”), in which it appears as ⺜ .
See also 敖 , 免 , and 美 . See also the inner component of 蒙 .

[帽]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *muːɡs ): semantic 巾 ( “ cloth ” ) + phonetic 冒 ( OC *muːɡs, *mɯːɡ ) . Originally written as 冃 ; later, 目 and 巾 were added.
